thread.title: Don’t Wimp Out on Climate - WSJ
thread.title_full: Don’t Wimp Out on Climate - WSJ

author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: Don’t Wimp Out on Climate - WSJ
text:
Don’t Wimp Out on Climate If Trump doesn’t dump the Paris accord, his economic agenda is in jeopardy. By Kimberley A. Strassel Feb. 16, 2017 7:17 p.m. ET 
President Trump will soon turn his attention to another major campaign promise—rolling back the Obama climate agenda—and according to one quoted administration source his executive orders on that topic will “suck the air out of the room.” That’s good, but only if Team Trump finishes the job by casting into that vacuum the Paris climate accord. 
That’s no longer a certainty, which ought to alarm anyone who voted for Mr. Trump in hopes of economic change. Candidate Trump correctly noted that the accord gave “foreign... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
